item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (118 points | 9 comments)
2. Were RNNs all we needed? (250 points | 107 comments)
3. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (584 points | 417 comments)
4. Cox slows Internet speeds in entire neighborhoods to punish any heavy users (78 points | 53 comments)
5. Tengine: Open-source web server, originated by Taobao, based on Nginx (39 points | 14 comments)
6. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (220 points | 119 comments)
7. Update on Reflection-70B (53 points | 32 comments)
8. The Heart of Unix (2018) (76 points | 24 comments)
9. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (768 points | 263 comments)
10. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (204 points | 52 comments)
11. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (213 points | 55 comments)
12. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (92 points | 23 comments)
13. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (18 points | 2 comments)
14. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
15. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (45 points | 10 comments)
16. AI agent promotes itself to sysadmin, trashes boot sequence (37 points | 16 comments)
17. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (170 points | 113 comments)
18. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (111 points | 19 comments)
19. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (30 points | 10 comments)
20. HTTrack Website Copier (52 points | 11 comments)
21. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (107 points | 66 comments)
22. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (128 points | 128 comments)
23. Biggest solar flare since 2017 erupts from sun and Earth is in the firing line (76 points | 28 comments)
24. Biblical plant with medicinal properties resurrected from 1,000-year-old seed (29 points | 5 comments)
25. Britain's last coal-fired power plant shuts down (51 points | 26 comments)
26. We’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (55 points | 7 comments)
27. You Can't Opt-Out of A.I. Online (53 points | 54 comments)
28. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (24 points | 4 comments)
29. Show HN: I made a super-simple image CDN (21 points | 19 comments)
30. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (6 points | 3 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
